sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>true</before>
        <description>Updates metric reference in additional conditions of PA indicators. This script overwrites those apply_once scripts.</description>
        <name>Update condition in PA indicators</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[if (!pm.isZboot()) {
    var paIndicators = [
        '9a4214bcdbfcc7009d2bff561d9619bc',
        '9aaa9991eb0112001e68286b1206fea5',
        '85ff807cdbfcc7009d2bff561d961926'
    ];
    var tableName = 'pa_indicators';
    for (var i in paIndicators) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
        if (gr.get(paIndicators[i])) {
            var fileName = tableName + "_" + paIndicators[i] + ".xml";
            sn_applyonce.ApplyOnce.allowOneMoreUpdate(fileName);
        }
    }
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-10-14 20:00:01</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>ab1d11040793301008e2194b8fd3003b</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Update condition in PA indicators</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">f6f1465693eb3110b31a30dcebba10d6</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_ab1d11040793301008e2194b8fd3003b</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-10-14 20:42:22</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
